thread.title: 21 Times Jake Gyllenhaal Was A Lovable Little Shit
thread.title_full: 21 Times Jake Gyllenhaal Was A Lovable Little Shit

author: Anna
title: 21 Times Jake Gyllenhaal Was A Lovable Little Shit
text:
Your hand are free, Jake! Why are you doing this! ID: 10401147 11. When he put little to no effort into his sign for the Woman’s March on Washington D.C. View this image ›
Via Facebook: JakeGyllenhaal (Thank you for your solidarity, Jake.)
ID: 10401056 12. When he was so enamored by Rihanna, he forgot how to do anything but smile goofily. https://yawnatyou.tumblr.com/post/144657415085/badgalriri View this embed ›
Same.
ID: 10401101 13. When he was in an actual, honest-to-God ’90s boyband. View this image ›
The Ellen Show ID: 10401095 14. That time he held his dog like a god damn basketball or something. https://dirspikejonze.tumblr.com/post/126887586912/ive-seen-tons-of-photos-of-jake-gyllenhaal-holding View this embed ›
ID: 10407991 15. And basically any time he tried to hold his dog, ever. https://julian2006.tumblr.com/post/114004228767/jake-gyllenhaal-doesnt-know-how-to-hold-dogs-and-i View this embed ›
ID: 10408069 16. When he low-key shaded 34-year-olds. View this image ›
TBS / Via dailygyllenhaals.tumblr.com ID: 10408582 17. When he recognized his beard for what it was. View this image ›
BBC1 / Via youtube.com ID: 10407494 18. And when he did not recognize his mustache for what it was. https://dailygyllenhaals.tumblr.com/post/147659439556/jake-gyllenhaal-walking-his-dog-leo-in-nyc-july View this embed ›
I assume he wouldn’t have gone out in public if he had.
ID: 10401125 19. When he wrote a letter to KFC demanding the return of what sounds like the most disgusting sandwich of all time. View this image ›
Via dailygyllenhaals.tumblr.com ID: 10407972 20. The time he was very determined to be a little shit in his Reddit AMA. View this image ›
Reddit / Via reddit.com ID: 10408643 21. And when he was just super done with silly questions. View this image ›
Via dailygyllenhaals.tumblr.com ID: 10408596 Never change, Jake. Never change. View this image ›
20th Century Fox ID: 10408646
